name: pre-ui-component-validation
description: Enforces design system compliance before UI component implementation

prompt.message:
DESIGN SYSTEM COMPLIANCE CHECK

Before writing this UI code, verify:

1. TEMPLATE FETCHED?
   - Have you called get_page() or get_component() from the MCP?
   - Have you called get_styles() for design tokens?

2. VISUAL IDENTITY CHECKLIST (must match template):
   □ Sidebar active state uses bg-primary (NOT bg-accent)
   □ fadeInUp animation uses translateY(40px)
   □ slideUp animation uses translateY(30px)
   □ Card glow uses radial-gradient (NOT box-shadow)
   □ Card border-radius: rounded-xl sm:rounded-2xl
   □ Card padding: p-4 sm:p-6
   □ Stagger animation delay: 100ms between items

3. RESPONSIVE TYPOGRAPHY:
   □ Hero title: text-5xl md:text-7xl lg:text-8xl
   □ Section title: text-2xl md:text-4xl lg:text-5xl
   □ Card title: text-lg sm:text-xl md:text-2xl
   □ Price: text-2xl sm:text-3xl md:text-4xl

4. CONTENT ADAPTATION (must NOT copy template data):
   □ Metrics/KPIs are from the USER'S PROJECT, not template examples
   □ Menu items match the USER'S navigation, not the template
   □ Labels and titles are relevant to the USER'S project
   □ No template placeholder data was kept as real content

If you haven't fetched templates or verified these values, STOP and fetch them first.
Remember: copy the VISUAL IDENTITY, adapt the CONTENT.

DESIGN SYSTEM EDIT CHECK

Before editing this UI code:

1. Have you verified the current implementation against the design template?
2. Will this edit maintain visual identity compliance?
3. Are you adapting content to the project (not copying template examples)?

Visual identity to preserve:
- Sidebar active: bg-primary (blue, NOT yellow)
- Animation translateY: 40px (fadeInUp), 30px (slideUp)
- Card glow: radial-gradient approach
- Responsive classes: mobile-first with breakpoint modifiers

Content to adapt:
- Metrics, labels, menu items → use project's real data
- Never keep template example values as real content

If unsure, fetch the relevant template with get_page() or get_component() first.

metadata.author: Labzz Design System
metadata.purpose: Prevents UI implementations that don't match design specifications
